text: Mahmoud Riad () (January 8, 1917 â€“ January 25, 1992) was an Egyptian diplomat. He was Egyptian ambassador to United Nations from 1962 to 1964, Egyptian Minister of Foreign Affairs from 1964 to 1972, and Secretary-General of the League of Arab States from 1972 to 1979. ==Honour== ===Foreign honour=== * : Honorary Commander of the Order of the Defender of the Realm (1965) ==References== Category:1917 births Category:1992 deaths Category:Egyptian politicians Category:Secretaries General of the Arab League Category:People from Cairo Category:Order of the Defender of the Realm
title: Mahmoud Riad
